AddressEmptyCode(address).details: There's no code at `target` (it is not a contract).

AddressInsufficientBalance(address).details: The ETH balance of the account is not enough to perform the operation.

FailedInnerCall().details: A call to an address target failed. The target may have reverted.

SafeERC20FailedOperation(address).details: An operation with an ERC20 token failed.

cancelStream(uint256).details: If the beneficiary has some unclaimed balance, it will be transfer to him The rest of the balance on the stream will be transfer to the ownerIt fails if the stream doesn´t existIt fails if the caller is not the ownerIt fails if the transfer fails

params.deposit: The amount to fund the wallet

params.token: The token to know user´s balance

params.beneficiary: The one to receive the payment

params.beneficiaries: Array of the ones to receive the payments
The one to receive the stream

params.beneficiary: The one to receive the stream

pause(uint256).details: It fails if the caller is not the ownerIt fails if the stream is not active

resumeStream(uint256,bool).details: It fails if the caller is not the ownerIt fails if the stream is not active

params.paid: True if it is a paid pause, false if not

withdraw(uint256).details: It fails if the stream doesn´t existIt fails if the caller is not the beneficiaryIt fails if the amount is bigger than the balance leftIt fails if the transfer fails

withdrawAll().details: It fails if the stream doesn´t existIt fails if the caller is not the beneficiaryIt fails if the amount is bigger than the balance leftIt fails if the transfer fails

withdrawFromWallet(uint256,address).details: It fails if the token is not USDC or USDTIt fails if the amount is "0"It fails if the user does not have enough balance

params.amount: The amount to withdraw from wallet
